hibernate-mapping.query: from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and ((calendar.start-curdate())*(calendar.finish-curdate())) <= all(select (c.start-curdate())*(c.finish-curdate()) from TeachCalendar as c where c.studentType.id=:studentTypeId) )
select calendar.term from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.year=:year and calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId order by ((calendar.start-curdate())*(calendar.finish-curdate()))
select calendar.year from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId order by ((calendar.start-curdate())*(calendar.finish-curdate()))
select calendar from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and to_date(to_char(curdate(),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') between calendar.start and calendar.finish
select calendar from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and to_date(to_char(curdate(),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') < calendar.start order by calendar.start asc
select calendar from TeachCalendar as calendar where calendar.studentType.id=:studentTypeId and to_date(to_char(curdate(),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') > calendar.finish order by calendar.start desc
from TeachCalendar as calendar where to_date(to_char(curdate(),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') between calendar.start and calendar.finish
